DAP-2020 Rev.A Firmware Release Note


Firmware: 1.03rc004
Hardware: Ax
Date: 2023/01/14

Problems Resolved:
1. Fixes security issues:
ZDI-CAN-18414
ZDI-CAN-18415
ZDI-CAN-18416
ZDI-CAN-18417
ZDI-CAN-18418
ZDI-CAN-18419
ZDI-CAN-18422
ZDI-CAN-18423
ZDI-CAN-18454
ZDI-CAN-18455
ZDI-CAN-18746

----------

Firmware: 1.03rc004
Hardware: Ax
Date: 2021/05/21

Problems Resolved:
1. Solve the security problem , number of ZDI-CAN-11369 & ZDI-CAN-11856
2. Solve the hidden page source problem

----------

Firmware: 1.03rc002
Hardware: Ax
Date: 2020/10/27

Problems Resolved:
1. Fixed security issues:
- ZDI-CAN-10932: D-Link DAP-2020 webproc getpage Stack-based Buffer Overflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
- ZDI-CAN-11856: D-Link DAP-2020 errorpage External Control of File Name Information Disclosure Vulnerability
- ZDI-CAN-11369: D-Link DAP-2020 WEB_CmdFileList Command Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
2. Fixed Can't make manually settings.
3. Setup Wizards can't find available WLAN.

----------

Firmware: 1.02rc001
Hardware: Ax
Date: 2017/11/20

Problems Resolved:
1. Update WPA2 security patch

Enhancements:
None

----------

Firmware: 1.01rc001
Hardware: Ax
Date: 2017/02/08

Note:
1st EU firmware release
